title: Official : Manchester United confirm Phallon Tullis - Joyce has signed a new contract - Man United News And Transfer News
body_text:
Manchester United have confirmed that goalkeeper Phallon Tullis-Joyce has put pen to paper on a new deal, extending her stay at the club at least until June 2028.

She has been a key member of the squad this season, keeping an impressive 13 clean sheets from 19 games â€“ the most in the WSL. Her contributions have also been invaluable in helping United reach a third successive FA Cup final.

It has been a fantastic past few weeks for the 28-year-old, who also earned her first cap for the USA national team earlier this month.
Skinner recently branded Tullis-Joyce one of the best goalkeepers in the world.
Reacting to her new contract, Tullis-Joyce told club media, â€œI am really grateful to have this opportunity to continue the exciting journey we are on.â€

There is then the small matter of the FA Cup final against Chelsea at Wembley on May 18.
